text: Mechanical Production Operative required for a temporary ongoing assignment in the Salisbury area. The successful Production Operative must have recent experience of an assembly line or production line of a mechanical nature. You will need an eye for detail to ensure accuracy on the finished products and use of hand tools. Starting: Full training will be provided, this training will start on the day shift 8am-4pm (Monday-Friday). The pay rate will be £8. 94 per hour while you do your training, once completed a skills assessment will be conducted to look at your next pay level. The working hours will be starting on Monday-Friday 08:00am - 16:00pm. If you are interested or would like further information, please contact the team at Meridian on or via email at
